entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Prince Albert
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:45 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -10.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Albert Airport 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -10.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -12.5°C
Wind: ENE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or freezing rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning this morning then changing to snow near noon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
